summary:
Charlotte is the biggest city in North Carolina and the 15th largest in the United States. It's a busy place with lots of businesses and things to do. The city is home to big companies like Bank of America and has three professional sports teams: the Carolina Panthers, Charlotte Hornets, and Charlotte FC.

Charlotte has a warm climate and is near beautiful lakes and green spaces. It's one of the greenest cities in the world, with lots of parks and nature areas. The city has grown quickly, especially with young people, making it a popular place to live and visit.
title: Charlotte, North Carolina
